text: Resident Evil Village is a survival horror game developed and published by Capcom. The sequel to Resident Evil 7: Biohazard (2017), players control Ethan Winters, who is searching for his kidnapped daughter. Resident Evil Village also includes an online multiplayer mode. The game was announced at the PlayStation 5 reveal event in June 2020 and was released on May 7, 2021. Resident Evil Village received strong positive reviews. ==Note== ==References== Category:2021 video games Category:2020s horror video games Category:Resident Evil Category:Capcom games Category:First-person shooters Category:Gothic video games Category:IOS games Category:MacOS games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation 5 games Category:Science fiction video games Category:Single-player video games Category:Survival horror video games Category:Survival video games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games about cannibalism Category:Video games about children Category:Video games about ghosts Category:Video games about the afterlife Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Werewolf video games Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games Category:Xbox Series X and Series S games
title: Resident Evil Village
